meanings.definition: A class of organic compounds containing two benzene rings fused to a furan ring.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study dibenzofurans to understand their chemical properties.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician identified dibenzofurans in the sample using spectroscopy.
meanings.sent3: At the chemistry conference, the dibenzofurans made quite a buzz!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a collection of ideas, each dibenzofuran a unique puzzle piece.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the dibenzofurans sparkled like tiny jewels.

meanings.definition: Compounds with a chemical structure consisting of two benzene rings fused to a furan ring.
meanings.sent1: The pharmaceutical company synthesized dibenzofurans for medical research.
meanings.sent2: Environmental studies have shown the presence of dibenzofurans in polluted areas.
meanings.sent3: The dibenzofurans at the lab party were the life of the gathering.
meanings.sent4: In her mind, the dibenzofurans danced together in a complex chemical waltz.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted the dibenzofurans with vibrant colors on the canvas.
